ygData.subject: Re: You are all wrong
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sorry, you must be looking for the EQ Vault, it s down the hall and to the right.  I don t even care about the topic for the most part, but you Wayne, have
ygData.messageBody:
I'm sorry, you must be looking for the EQ Vault, it's
down the hall and to the right. I don't even care
about the topic for the most part, but you Wayne, have
marked yourself to me. From here on out every thing
you post I will question, as in your response you
displayed the debating skill of a twelve year old
trying to impress the older kids. I'm very
dissapointed that such a post ever came to our board.
At least it's the 95% that are kind, courteous, and
intellegent. I suppose we will always have to deal
with the 5% out there.

Deeply Saddened
Llewrend Lynnhaven
